job_description:
Job Description
GAP INTERNATIONAL – A unique, purpose-driven, consulting company

ABOUT GAP INTERNATIONAL

Gap International is a forward-thinking consulting firm dedicated to leveraging cutting-edge technologies to deliver innovative solutions tailored to our clients' needs. We are a team of passionate problem-solvers committed to excellence and innovation. As part of our growth strategy, we seek an Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning Engineer to contribute in pushing the boundaries of AI and ML and create innovative solutions for internal as well as client-facing projects within a dynamic, small company environment. This role offers a unique opportunity to contribute to a wide range of transformative projects such as dialog driven learning and knowledge discovery, as well as the acceleration of various business processes.

ABOUT THE ROLE

You will be part of a tight-knit, productive, and highly collaborative research and development team. As an AI/ML Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and deploying machine learning models and AI solutions to solve complex problems and improve operational efficiency within our organization. Your contributions have the chance to create significant impact on our products as well as the scientific community. The role involves working closely with cross-functional teams to understand requirements, explore and visualize data, build predictive models, and integrate effective AI/ML solutions into our internal processes and digital products.

RESPONSIBILITIES

Collaborate with project stakeholders to define scope, objectives, and requirements for AI and ML-driven projects.
Research, design, and implement algorithms and models that can learn from and make predictions or decisions based on data.
Collect, clean, and preprocess data from a variety of internal and external sources.
Evaluate the efficacy of different models and algorithms using appropriate metrics and statistical methods.
Keep abreast of developments in AI/ML to continuously improve and update models and techniques.
Prototype, deploy, and maintain AI/ML models in a production environment, ensuring they are scalable, reliable, and efficient.
Document the development process, architecture, and standard operating procedures for models and systems.
Work closely with IT and software development teams to integrate AI/ML solutions into our internal tools and workflows.
Assist in identifying opportunities for leveraging AI/ML to gain competitive advantages in our consulting services.

REQUIREMENTS

Completed a PhD degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Artificial Intelligence, or a relevant technical field.
Proven experience as an AI/ML Engineer, Data Scientist, or in a similar role, with a track record of designing and implementing machine learning models and algorithms.
Strong programming skills in Python or other relevant languages, and familiarity with AI/ML frameworks (e.g., PyTorch, Scikit-learn, as well as various Large Language Models, Prompt Engineering, Retrieval-Augmented Generation, AI agents, just to name a few).
In-depth understanding of machine learning algorithms, deep learning architectures, and statistical modeling techniques.
Experience with data engineering tools and platforms, and proficiency in handling large, complex datasets.
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills, with an ability to work on complex projects and translate business challenges into AI/ML-driven solutions.
Strong communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to effectively convey complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
Ability to work independently as well as part of a collaborative team in a fast-paced environment.

GAP INTERNATIONAL ASSOCIATES

Purposeful people at work impacting companies around the world.
People who thrive in a learning environment and enjoy learning, growing, and performing at their best; energized to continually push beyond their comfort zone.
Comfortable with ambiguity; eager to take on things they don't know how to do.
Curious and flexible when it comes to their own growth and development, as well as receptive to coaching and feedback to maximize their potential.
Willing to communicate and contribute thoughts, insights and new ideas to senior leaders both internally and externally.

WHAT WE OFFER

A role with significant impact and visibility within the company.
Opportunities for professional growth and development in a supportive and collaborative environment.
Competitive salary commensurate with experience.
A dynamic and inclusive company culture.
TO APPLY

Please submit your resume which includes a list of publications, a cover letter explaining your interest and how your skills and experience meet the qualifications of the position, and any relevant portfolio or GitHub links showcasing your previous work or projects.

Gap International associates are based out of our corporate office in the Philadelphia metropolitan area. In order to be considered for this role, applicants should be legally authorized to work in the US.

Gap International is an equal opportunity employer and values diversity. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need, and all qualified candidates will receive consideration.
tailored_resume:
Carl Lewis
AI Engineer | Startup Founder | Data Analyst
Email: 0xgmcarl@gmail.com
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/gmcarl

Summary:
Seasoned AI Engineer and Startup founder with a robust skillset in AI automation, data analysis, and software development. Proven ability to lead cross-functional teams and deliver high-impact, scalable solutions. With a focus on AI and machine learning, I drive transformation through data, automation, and workflow optimization for efficiency.

Skills:
- AI automation
- Data analysis & visualization
- Software development
- Project management
- Python
- SQL
- Javascript
- React

Experience:

Founder | Craft The Future | May 2019 - Present
- Designed and led workshops on AI, automation, and workflow efficiency, helping 100+ individuals improve operational performance.

Director of AI & Business Automation | Food FiXR | October 2024 - Present
- Led a cross-functional team in building an AI-driven nutrition platform, improving engagement by 35%.
- Worked closely with stakeholders to implement personalized recommendation systems, aligning technology with user needs and business goals.

Business Analyst - Intern | i.c.stars | January 2025 – Present
- Consulted with business leaders to design AI-powered process optimizations, improving workflow efficiency and reducing errors by 60%.
- Led a data-driven workflow redesign, integrating AI metadata tagging to enhance content management strategies.

Education & Certifications:
- 1871 Tech Leaders Certificate | 1871 Innovation Labs | December 2024

Publication:
- How To Be A NoCode Creative | Amazon Publishing | December 2024

Format:
- Optimized for ATS systems
- Key information and skills are highlighted and easy to find
- Removed irrelevant experiences for clarity and focus
- Used bullet points for easy reading

Improvements in Progress:
- Gaining exposure to PyTorch and Scikit-learn
- Deepening knowledge in deep learning architectures
- Acquiring skills in data engineering

References available upon request.
